sql.query:
INSERT INTO enrolments
(enrolmentType, dropDate, isValid, startDate, dropReason, uuid, student_uuid, class_uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.enrolmentType}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.dropDate || null}} */, '1', :P3 /* {{$_POST.startDate}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.dropReason}} */, :P5 /* {{'enr_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.student_uuid}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.class_uuid}} */)

options.comment: If family charge already exists - update

sql.query:
UPDATE charges_family
SET total = :P1 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.familygrandtotal}} */, dueDate = :P2 /* {{duedate}} */, basetotal = :P3 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.baseRate}} */, discountotal = :P4 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.disctotal}} */, updated = :P5 /* {{TIMESTAMP}} */, updatedby = :P6 /* {{identity}} */
WHERE uuid = :P7 /* {{calc_tuition.monthlychargeexists.charge_uuid}} */

INSERT INTO charges_family
(total, title, chargeFor_monthly, dueDate, chargeType, basetotal, discountotal, chargeDate, created, createdby, uuid, family_uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.familygrandtotal}} */, :P2 /* {{'Family Tuition Charge: '+calc_tuition.chargefor}} */, :P3 /* {{calc_tuition.monthtocharge}} */, :P4 /* {{duedate}} */, 'tuition', :P5 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.baseRate}} */, :P6 /* {{calc_tuition.totals.disctotal}} */, :P7 /* {{chargedate}} */, :P8 /* {{TIMESTAMP}} */, :P9 /* {{identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'chf_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */, :P11 /* {{$_GET.family_uuid}} */)

options.comment: If family charge doesnt exists - insert

sql.query:
UPDATE charges_enrolments
SET baseRate = :P1 /* {{pricing.baseRate}} */, endisc = :P2 /* {{pricing.endisc}} */, ennetrate = :P3 /* {{pricing.ennetrate}} */, endiscdescription = :P4 /* {{pricing.endiscdescription}} */, endiscrate = :P5 /* {{pricing.endiscrate}} */, familydiscountdesc = :P6 /* {{pricing.familydiscountdesc}} */, familydiscountrate = :P7 /* {{pricing.familydiscountrate}} */, familydiscounttotal = :P8 /* {{pricing.familydiscounttotal}} */, enrolGrandTotal = :P9 /* {{pricing.enrolGrandTotal}} */, debuggerstatus = 'Update'
WHERE uuid = :P10 /* {{query_findexistingcharge.uuid}} */

INSERT INTO charges_enrolments
(startofweek, classId, studentid, classTypeId, enrolid, classDate, baseRate, endisc, ennetrate, endiscdescription, endiscrate, familydiscountdesc, familydiscountrate, familydiscounttotal, enrolGrandTotal, chargeId, isvalid, debuggerstatus, lineInvNumber, class_uuid, student_uuid, classtype_uuid, enrolment_uuid, charge_uuid, uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{startofweek}} */, :P2 /* {{classId}} */, :P3 /* {{student}} */, :P4 /* {{classType}} */, :P5 /* {{id}} */, :P6 /* {{classdate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, :P7 /* {{pricing.baseRate}} */, :P8 /* {{pricing.endisc}} */, :P9 /* {{pricing.enNetRate}} */, :P10 /* {{pricing.endiscdescription}} */, :P11 /* {{pricing.endiscrate}} */, :P12 /* {{pricing.familydiscountdesc}} */, :P13 /* {{pricing.familydiscountrate}} */, :P14 /* {{pricing.familydiscounttotal}} */, :P15 /* {{pricing.enrolGrandTotal}} */, :P16 /* {{setfamilychargeid}} */, '1', 'insert', :P17 /* {{generate_lineinvoicenumber.lineinvnumber}} */, :P18 /* {{class_uuid}} */, :P19 /* {{student_uuid}} */, :P20 /* {{classtype_uuid}} */, :P21 /* {{enrolment_uuid}} */, :P22 /* {{set_chargeuuid}} */, :P23 /* {{'che_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */)
